verses.verse: After<WG3326> these<WG5023> things the LORD<WG2962> appointed<WG322> other<WG2087> seventy<WG1440> also,<WG2532> and sent<WG649> them two<WG1417> and two before<WG4253> his face<WG4383> into<WG1519> every<WG3956> city<WG4172> and place,<WG5117> where<WG3757> he himself<WG846> would<WG3195> come.<WG2064>

Therefore<WG3767> said<WG3004> he to them, The harvest<WG2326> truly <WG3303> is great,<WG4183> but the laborers <WG2040> are few:<WG3641> pray<WG1189> you therefore the Lord<WG2962> of the harvest,<WG2326> that he would send<WG1544> forth<WG1544> laborers<WG2040> into<WG1519> his harvest. <WG2326>
Go<WG4198> your ways: behold,<WG2400> I send<WG649> you forth<WG649> as lambs<WG704> among <WG1722> <WG3319> wolves. <WG3074>
Carry<WG941> neither<WG3361> purse,<WG905> nor<WG3361> money,<WG4082> nor<WG3361> shoes:<WG5266> and salute<WG782> no<WG3367> man<WG3367> by the way. <WG3598>
And into<WG1519> whatever <WG3739> <WG302> house<WG3614> you enter,<WG1525> first<WG4412> say,<WG3004> Peace <WG1515> be to this<WG5129> house. <WG3624>
And if<WG1437> the son<WG5207> of peace<WG1515> be there,<WG1563> your<WG5216> peace<WG1515> shall rest<WG1879> on it: if<WG1490> not, it shall turn<WG344> to you again. <WG344>

And in the same<WG846> house<WG3614> remain,<WG3306> eating<WG2068> and drinking<WG4095> such things as they give:<WG3844> for the laborer<WG2040> is worthy<WG514> of his hire.<WG3408> Go<WG3327> not from house<WG3614> to house. <WG3614>
And into<WG1519> whatever <WG3739> <WG302> city<WG4172> you enter,<WG1525> and they receive<WG1209> you, eat<WG2068> such things as are set<WG3908> before<WG3908> you:
And heal<WG2323> the sick<WG772> that are therein, <WG1722> <WG846> and say<WG3004> to them, The kingdom<WG932> of God<WG2316> is come<WG1448> near<WG1448> to you.

But into<WG1519> whatever <WG3739> <WG302> city<WG4172> you enter,<WG1525> and they receive<WG1209> you not, go<WG1831> your ways out into<WG1519> the streets<WG4113> of the same,<WG846> and say, <WG2036>

Even<WG2532> the very dust<WG2868> of your<WG5216> city,<WG4172> which<WG3588> sticks<WG2853> on us, we do wipe<WG631> off<WG631> against you: notwithstanding<WG4133> be you sure<WG1097> of this,<WG5124> that the kingdom<WG932> of God<WG2316> is come<WG1448> near<WG1448> to you.
But I say<WG3004> to you, that it shall be more<WG414> tolerable<WG414> in that day<WG2250> for Sodom,<WG4670> than<WG2228> for that city. <WG4172>

Woe<WG3759> to you, Chorazin!<WG5523> woe<WG3759> to you, Bethsaida!<WG966> for if<WG1487> the mighty<WG1411> works had been done<WG1096> in Tyre<WG5184> and Sidon,<WG4605> which<WG3739> have been done<WG1096> in you, they had a great<WG3819> while ago<WG3819> repented,<WG3340> sitting<WG2521> in sackcloth<WG4526> and ashes. <WG4700>
But it shall be more<WG414> tolerable<WG414> for Tyre<WG5184> and Sidon<WG4605> at<WG1722> the judgment,<WG2920> than<WG2228> for you.
And you, Capernaum,<WG2584> which<WG3588> are exalted<WG5312> to heaven,<WG3772> shall be thrust<WG2601> down<WG2601> to hell. <WG86>
He that hears<WG191> you hears<WG191> me; and he that despises<WG114> you despises<WG114> me; and he that despises<WG114> me despises<WG114> him that sent<WG649> me.
And the seventy<WG1440> returned<WG5290> again<WG5290> with joy,<WG5479> saying,<WG3004> Lord,<WG2962> even<WG2532> the devils<WG1140> are subject<WG5293> to us through<WG1722> your name.<WG3686>
And he said<WG2036> to them, I beheld<WG2334> Satan<WG4567> as lightning<WG796> fall<WG4098> from heaven. <WG3772>

Behold,<WG2400> I give<WG1325> to you power<WG1849> to tread<WG3961> on<WG1883> serpents<WG3789> and scorpions,<WG4651> and over<WG1909> all<WG3956> the power<WG1411> of the enemy:<WG2190> and nothing<WG3762> shall by any<WG3364> means<WG3364> hurt<WG91> you.

Notwithstanding<WG4133> in this<WG5129> rejoice<WG5463> not, that the spirits<WG4151> are subject<WG5293> to you; but rather<WG3123> rejoice,<WG5463> because<WG3754> your<WG5216> names<WG3686> are written<WG1125> in heaven. <WG3772>

In that hour<WG5610> Jesus<WG2424> rejoiced<WG21> in spirit,<WG4151> and said,<WG2036> I thank<WG1843> you, O Father,<WG3962> Lord<WG2962> of heaven<WG3772> and earth,<WG1093> that you have hid<WG613> these<WG5023> things from the wise<WG4680> and prudent,<WG4908> and have revealed<WG601> them to babes:<WG3516> even<WG3483> so,<WG3488> Father;<WG3962> for so<WG3779> it seemed <WG1096> <WG2107> good in your sight. <WG1715>

All<WG3956> things are delivered<WG3860> to me of my Father:<WG3962> and no<WG3762> man<WG3762> knows<WG1097> who<WG5101> the Son<WG5207> is, but the Father;<WG3962> and who<WG5101> the Father<WG3962> is, but the Son,<WG5207> and he to whom<WG3739> the Son<WG5207> will<WG1014> reveal <WG601> him.
And he turned<WG4762> him to his disciples,<WG3101> and said<WG2036> privately,<WG2596> <WG2398> Blessed <WG3107> are the eyes<WG3788> which<WG3588> see<WG991> the things that you see: <WG991>

For I tell<WG3004> you, that many<WG4183> prophets<WG4396> and kings<WG935> have desired<WG2309> to see<WG1492> those things which<WG3739> you see,<WG991> and have not seen <WG1492> them; and to hear<WG191> those things which<WG3739> you hear,<WG191> and have not heard <WG191> them.

And, behold,<WG2400> a certain<WG5100> lawyer<WG3544> stood<WG450> up, and tempted<WG1598> him, saying,<WG3004> Master,<WG1320> what<WG5101> shall I do<WG4160> to inherit<WG2816> eternal<WG166> life?<WG2222>
He said<WG2036> to him, What<WG5101> is written<WG1125> in the law?<WG3551> how<WG4459> read<WG314> you?

And he answering<WG611> said,<WG2036> You shall love<WG25> the Lord<WG2962> your God<WG2316> with all<WG3650> your heart,<WG2588> and with all<WG3650> your soul,<WG5590> and with all<WG3650> your strength,<WG2479> and with all<WG3650> your mind;<WG1271> and your neighbor<WG4139> as yourself.<WG4572>
And he said<WG2036> to him, You have answered<WG611> right:<WG3723> this<WG5124> do,<WG4160> and you shall live. <WG2198>
But he, willing<WG2309> to justify<WG1344> himself,<WG1438> said<WG2036> to Jesus,<WG2424> And who<WG5101> is my neighbor?<WG4139>

And Jesus<WG2424> answering<WG5274> said,<WG2036> A certain <WG5100> man<WG444> went<WG2597> down<WG2597> from Jerusalem<WG2419> to Jericho,<WG2410> and fell<WG4045> among<WG4045> thieves,<WG3027> which<WG3739> stripped<WG1562> him of his raiment, and wounded <WG4127> <WG2007> him, and departed,<WG565> leaving <WG863> him half<WG2253> dead. <WG2253>
And by chance<WG4795> there came<WG2597> down a certain<WG5100> priest<WG2409> that way:<WG3598> and when he saw<WG1492> him, he passed<WG492> by on the other<WG492> side. <WG492>
And likewise<WG3668> a Levite,<WG3019> when he was at<WG2596> the place,<WG5117> came<WG2064> and looked <WG1492> on him, and passed<WG492> by on the other<WG492> side. <WG492>
But a certain<WG5100> Samaritan,<WG4541> as he journeyed,<WG3593> came<WG2064> where<WG2596> he was: and when he saw<WG1492> him, he had compassion <WG4697> on him,

And went<WG4334> to him, and bound<WG2611> up his wounds,<WG5134> pouring in oil<WG1637> and wine,<WG3631> and set<WG1913> him on<WG1909> his own<WG2398> beast,<WG2934> and brought<WG71> him to an inn,<WG3829> and took<WG1959> care<WG1959> of him.

And on<WG1909> the morrow<WG839> when he departed,<WG1831> he took<WG1544> out two<WG1417> pence,<WG1220> and gave <WG1325> them to the host,<WG3830> and said<WG2036> to him, Take care<WG1959> of him; and whatever <WG3748> <WG302> you spend<WG4325> more,<WG4325> when <WG1722> <WG3588> I come<WG1880> again,<WG1880> I will repay<WG591> you.
Which<WG5101> now<WG3767> of these<WG5130> three,<WG5140> think<WG1380> you, was neighbor<WG4139> to him that fell<WG1706> among<WG1519> the thieves? <WG3027>
And he said,<WG2036> He that showed<WG4160> mercy<WG1656> on<WG3326> him. Then<WG3767> said<WG2036> Jesus<WG2424> to him, Go,<WG4198> and do<WG4160> you likewise. <WG3668>

Now<WG1161> it came<WG1096> to pass, as they went,<WG4198> that he entered<WG1525> into<WG1519> a certain<WG5100> village:<WG2968> and a certain<WG5100> woman<WG1135> named<WG3686> Martha<WG3136> received<WG5264> him into<WG1519> her house.<WG3624>
And she had<WG1510> a sister<WG79> called<WG2564> Mary,<WG3137> which also<WG2532> sat<WG3869> at<WG3844> Jesus'<WG2424> feet,<WG4228> and heard<WG191> his word.<WG3056>

But Martha<WG3136> was encumbered<WG4049> about<WG4012> much<WG4183> serving,<WG1248> and came<WG2186> to him, and said,<WG2036> Lord,<WG2962> do you not care<WG3199> that my sister<WG79> has left<WG2641> me to serve<WG1247> alone?<WG3441> bid<WG2036> her therefore<WG3767> that she help<WG4878> me.
And Jesus<WG2424> answered<WG611> and said<WG2036> to her, Martha,<WG3136> Martha,<WG3136> you are careful<WG3309> and troubled<WG5182> about<WG4012> many<WG4183> things:
But one<WG1520> thing is needful:<WG5532> and Mary<WG3137> has chosen<WG1586> that good<WG18> part,<WG3310> which<WG3748> shall not be taken<WG851> away<WG851> from her.
